mapper.select: select distinct t.branchNum, p.purchasefilmNum, p.purchaseDate, p.filmdeadline,f.filmNum, f.filmName, f.filmStory, g.genreName, m.movieimgurl from theather t,purchasefilm p, film f, movieimg m, genre g, branch b where t.branchNum=#{branchNum} and p.purchasefilmNum=#{purchasefilmNum} and p.filmNum=f.filmNum and f.filmNum=m.filmNum and f.genreNum=g.genreNum and b.branchNum=p.branchNum and t.branchNum=b.branchNum

select m.mscheduleNum, m.mstarttime, m.purchasefilmNum, m.theathernum, t.branchNum, f.filmname, t.theathername, (select count(*) from seat ss where ss.theathernum=m.theathernum group by theathernum)- (select count(*) from book bb where bb.mscheduleNum=m.mscheduleNum) remaining from mschedule m, theather t, purchasefilm p, film f where m.theatherNum=t.theatherNum and m.purchasefilmnum=p.purchasefilmnum and p.filmnum=f.filmnum and t.branchNum=#{branchNum} and to_char(m.mstarttime,'YYYY-MM-DD')=#{regDate} order by f.filmname asc, t.theathernum asc, mstarttime asc
